front.title: Applying Cryptographically Generated Addresses to BUB (BUB+)

abstract.t: This memo describes a method to exploit the Cryptographically Generated Address (CGA) features in highly mobile environment. The draft introduces a new optimization to the "Binding Update Backhauling (BUB)" proposal, which eliminates the need for running a return routability (RR) procedure at the beginning and improves its security.
